divs: Sighting DetailsAs I arrived home from college on october the 8th I decided that I was going to search for ufo's with my new digital camera. There is a method for catching these during the day which involves taking the inside of a floppy disk out and taping that material to your camera of choice. So the sory starts by me looking at the sky with my camera and the floppy tape attatched. It was a very cloudy day but with the techniqe i used it allowed me to see things that could not be seen with the naked eye. The next moment i noticed a small black dot start moving in very strange movments. Going back from left to right very quickly I decided to record this. The event lasted for 1 hr and i recored it for 5 minutes. Ive sent my video to Robert Marsh who gave me the link to this site. From what he said it seems like he likes the video. The video clearly shows an object in very thick cloud cover performing moves that an airplane, nor helicopter can make.
